attributes.action: require Lord Mandelson to give up his claim to allowances as a member of the House of Lords whilst he is in receipt of a salary and expenses as a Minister of State.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only is Lord Mandelsom receiving money from the European Union in regard to his previous status as a minister of the EU but he has also been claiming the tax free allowances payable to Members of the House of Lords. This is a gross misuse of public funds and an affront to tax-payers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
